title: Clone a git repository
description: Installs git and clones specified repository

GitRepoURI.description: The URI of the Git repository to clone (Only HTTPS urls are supported).

Destination.description: A parent directory into which your repository will be cloned. E.g. - If you specify your destination as c:\Repos, then a new sub-directory (c:\Repos\{your local repo}) will be created and your repo will be cloned into it.

Branch.description: The branch or tag that will be checked out. Specify 'master' if you're not sure.

PersonalAccessToken.description: Personal Access Token for accessing the Git repository.
